channel.title: Firefox To IE7 on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Firefox To IE7 on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Convert your firefox favorites and feeds into IE7 with "Firefox To IE7"
item.description: Currently there is no way to import your firefox favorites and feeds into IE7, and from what I have heard there is no plan on adding this into IE7. So with this in mind, I made this application so that developers or anyone who needs to use their firefox bookmarks in IE7 can do so easily. All you have to do is run the application and if you have firefox installed it will automatically find your bookmarks, or you can browse for your exported firefox “bookmarks.
